instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
3. THEME: Force DARK MODE. The app should look like a developer tool (Linear/Vercel).
4. HERO: Build a 'Bento Grid' style hero or a centered hero with a massive 3D-tilted dashboard image.
5. COLORS: Use the Gold (#c4a052) sparingly for high-value accents (buttons, key stats). Use Navy (#1a365d) for deep backgrounds.
6. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for the 'Accordion' (Tech Deep Dive) and 'Cards'. Heavily customize them to remove the default white borders.
7. ARCHITECTURE: Create a visual diagram using CSS Grid/Flexbox and Icons. Do not just list text.
8. AI SECTION: Use a 'Chat Interface' mockup to show the AI capabilities.
9. FOOTER: Make it massive. 4 columns. Dark background.
10. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
